s-1.ptxt: DISPOSE OF FRONT SHOCK ABSORBER ASSEMBLY LH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the other front shock absorber.

s2.ptxt: Fully extend the shock absorber piston rod and fix the shock absorber in place at an angle in a vise or similar tool.
Using a drill or similar tool, slowly make a hole approximately 35 mm (1.38 in.) from the top end of the shock absorber and discharge the gas inside of it.

item.ptxt: The gas is colorless, odorless and harmless.
Since the discharged gas may cause chips to fly off, cover the drill with a cloth when making a hole.
